p.n: 25 Years of Women's Cricket on Sky
p.k: Twenty five years after showing women's cricket for the first time in 1996, Sky Sports looks back at some of the sport's most memorable moments

South Africa meet Pakistan in the third out of four T20 matches in Pretoria. The sides come here tied at 1-1 after South Africa comfortably won the second match
